title: QoL issue with League of Legends Icon
body: This issue is just a pretty basic quality of life issue that I can't figure out. I can log on fine and play the game perfectly fine, but for some reason the League client icon in my dock is this paper, pencil, ruler, and paintbrush icon. It's not a huge deal, but it bugs me and I was hoping someone could help me fix it. Thank you in advance

replies.body:
Try unpinning this specific shortcut from the dock, then go into your **Applications** folder and drag a new shortcut to your dock. That should fix this situation right up.

Let me know if you weren't able to get that to work for you.
